item.title: Term Deposit Subscription Prediction
item.description: Introduction Data Manipulation and Descriptive Analysis Missing data, NAs Imbalance Classification Correlation Distributions Model Fitting Training and Testing Data Decision Tree fitting Cross-validation, Tree-pruning and Training Errors Testing Error and Prediction Accuracy Interpretation Business Strategy Next Introduction The dataset used in this project is obtained fromm the UCI Machine Learning Repository. This dataset is related to direct telemarketing campaigns of a Portuguese banking institution, collected from 2008 to 2013.
